product_name: Primal Wear Paardebloem Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: Ride in both comfort and style in the women's Primal Wear Paardebloem Bike Jersey, with its wicking, fast-drying SpeedPro fabric and eye-catching graphic design. SpeedPro double-knit polyester fabric pulls moisture off the skin and dries quickly, thanks to different yarns on the exterior and interior; provides 2-way stretch. Offers UPF 35 sun protection. Sleeves and hem are free of elastic bindings. Primal Wear Paardebloem Bike Jersey has a 3/4-length front zipper for excellent ventilation options.
short_description: Ride in both comfort and style in the women's Primal Wear Paardebloem Bike Jersey, with its wicking, fast-drying SpeedPro fabric and eye-catching graphic design.
